name: @mittwald/api-client
description: Auto-generated client for the mittwald API

author.name: Mittwald CM Service GmbH & Co. KG

scripts.generate:client-dev:v2: curl --silent https://api-public.dev.mittwald.systems/openapi | ./transform-openapi.sh | yarn acg generate --name MittwaldAPIV2 - src/generated/v2 --optionalHeader x-access-token
scripts.generate:client:v2: curl --silent https://api.mittwald.de/openapi | ./transform-openapi.sh | yarn acg generate --name MittwaldAPIV2 - src/generated/v2 --optionalHeader x-access-token
